login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Access your dashboard
login.error_wrong_tenant: You do not have access to this workspace. Please login at your own workspace URL.

2fa.select_method_desc: Choose how you'd like to verify your identity
2fa.totp_desc: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
2fa.email_desc: We'll send a verification code to your email
2fa.email_sent: A verification code has been sent to your email

forgot_password.title: Reset Password
forgot_password.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.check_email_message: We've sent a password reset link to

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.subtitle: Enter your new password below
reset_password.min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters

lightbox.pdf_unsupported: Browser does not support PDF preview.
lightbox.pdf_blank_warning: Preview looks blank. Try download/open file.

file_manager.title: File Manager
file_manager.subtitle: Manage your organization's files and assets
file_manager.subtitle_admin: Manage uploaded files and assets across all tenants

confirm.delete_one_message: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.delete_many_message: Are you sure you want to delete {count} files ({size})? This action cannot be undone.

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.default_message: We're updating our systems to serve you better. Please check back soon!
maintenance.thanks: Thank you for your patience. We'll be back shortly!

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.message: You don't have the required permissions to view this page. This area is restricted to system administrators.

welcome.title: Welcome to {app}
welcome.subtitle: Let's get your application set up. We'll start by configuring the basics.

admin.title: Create Admin Account
admin.subtitle: This account will have full access to the system.

online.description: Pay securely with Credit Card, GoPay, ShopeePay, or Virtual Account via Midtrans.

manual.instructions: Please transfer the exact amount to one of the following accounts:

pending.title: Payment Verification Pending
pending.message: We have received your payment proof. Our team is verifying it. We will notify you once approved.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.message: Thank you for your payment. Your subscription has been activated.

errors.file_too_large: File size must be less than 5MB

support.title: Support Tickets
support.subtitle: Get help from your team or platform admins.

fields.subject: Subject
fields.subject_placeholder: e.g. Cannot login to my account

empty.title: No tickets yet
empty.subtitle: Create a ticket if you need help or have a request.

detail.closed_notice: This ticket is closed. You can’t reply.

announcements.title: Announcements
announcements.subtitle: Broadcast messages to users as banners and notifications.
announcements.feed_subtitle: Product updates, maintenance windows, and important notices.

fields.deliver_in_app_desc: Show to users in the app and send a notification.
fields.deliver_email_desc: Send this announcement to all recipients via email (ignores preferences).
fields.deliver_email_force_desc: When disabled, only users who enabled email announcements will receive it.
fields.title: Title

hints.schedule: Leave dates empty to publish immediately. End date controls when the banner stops showing.
hints.rich: Tip: Keep it concise. Links are allowed; images should be added as cover.

toasts.delivery_required: Choose at least one delivery channel.

confirm_delete.title: Delete notification
confirm_delete.message: Delete this notification? This action cannot be undone.

toasts.blocked: Notifications are blocked. Please allow notifications in your browser settings.
toasts.permission_denied: Permission denied. You need to allow notifications.

users.title: Manage Users
users.desc: View global users, roles, and access.

audit_logs.title: Audit Logs
audit_logs.subtitle: Track system activity and security events

empty.title: No users found
empty.subtitle: Try adjusting your search or filters.
empty.hint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

status.activate_message: Activate {name}? They will be able to login again.
status.deactivate_message: Deactivate {name}? They will not be able to login.

reset2fa.title: Reset Two-Factor Authentication
reset2fa.message: Reset 2FA for this user? They will be able to login without a secondary code.

toasts.superadmin_cannot_deactivate: Super Admin accounts cannot be deactivated here
toasts.cannot_deactivate_self: You cannot deactivate your own account

tenants.title: Tenants
tenants.subtitle: Manage all organizations in the platform

toggle.activate_message: Activate {name}? Users in this tenant will regain access.
toggle.deactivate_message: Deactivate {name}? Users in this tenant will be blocked from accessing the app.

delete.title: Delete Tenant
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this tenant? This action cannot be undone and will remove all associated data.

empty.title: No tenants found
empty.hint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

list.title: All Invoices
list.subtitle: Monitor all payments and transactions across the platform
list.empty_hint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

detail.title: Invoice Details
detail.approve_message: Are you sure you want to approve this payment? This will activate the subscription immediately.
detail.reject_message: Are you sure you want to reject this payment? The user will be notified.

ip_blocking.label: Enable IP Blocking
ip_blocking.desc: Automatically block IP addresses with suspicious activity.

max_login_attempts.label: Max Login Attempts
max_login_attempts.desc: Number of failed login attempts before account lockout.

lockout_duration.label: Lockout Duration
lockout_duration.desc: How long a user stays locked out after max failed attempts.

api_rate_limit.label: API Rate Limit
api_rate_limit.desc: Maximum API requests allowed per minute per user.

enable_2fa.label: Enable 2FA
enable_2fa.desc: Allow users to set up two-factor authentication for enhanced security.

enable_totp.label: TOTP (Authenticator App)
enable_totp.desc: Allow users to verify with Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.

email_otp.label: Email OTP
email_otp.desc: Allow users to receive verification codes via email.

email_otp_expiry.label: Email OTP Expiry
email_otp_expiry.desc: How long email verification codes remain valid.

allow_public_registration.label: Allow Public Registration
allow_public_registration.desc: Allow new users to sign up freely.

require_email_verification.label: Require Email Verification
require_email_verification.desc: Users must verify email before logging in.

jwt_expiry.label: JWT Expiry (Hours)
jwt_expiry.desc: How long an auth token remains valid.

driver.label: Storage Driver
driver.desc: Choose where files are stored. Local uses the server's disk.

s3.public_url_hint: CDN URL if serving files publicly.

storage.max_file_size_mb_desc: Maximum allowed size for a single file upload.
storage.allowed_extensions_desc: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions (e.g., jpg, png, pdf). Use * for all.

midtrans.title: Midtrans Gateway

enable.label: Enable Midtrans Gateway
enable.desc: Allow users to pay online via Midtrans.

midtrans.server_key_hint: From Midtrans Dashboard > Settings > Access Keys.
midtrans.production_mode_desc: Enable for real transactions. Disable for Sandbox.

manual.title: Manual Bank Transfer

enable.label: Enable Manual Transfer
enable.desc: Allow users to pay via bank transfer and upload proof.

manual.instructions_desc: Instructions shown to user when they select Manual Transfer.

public_url.label: Public Application URL
public_url.desc: Base URL for redirects, emails, and payment callbacks (e.g. https://app.example.com).

main_domain.label: Main Domain
main_domain.desc: The primary domain where the application is hosted (e.g. example.com). Used for domain validation and tenant routing.

currency.label: Default Currency
currency.desc: Currency used for plan pricing and invoice display (ISO 4217, e.g. IDR, USD).

maintenance_mode.label: Enable Maintenance Mode
maintenance_mode.desc: When enabled, all users except superadmins will see a maintenance page.

maintenance_message.label: Maintenance Message
maintenance_message.desc: The message displayed to users when maintenance mode is active.

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.desc: Used to interpret schedule times (e.g. backups). Choose an IANA timezone.

placeholders.manual_instructions: Please transfer to one of the bank accounts below and upload proof.

enabled.label: Enable Alerting
enabled.desc: Send email alerts when error thresholds are exceeded.

error_threshold.label: Error Rate Threshold (%)
error_threshold.desc: Alert when error rate exceeds this percentage.

rate_limit_threshold.label: Rate Limit Threshold
rate_limit_threshold.desc: Alert when rate-limited requests exceed this count.

response_time_threshold.label: P95 Response Time Threshold (ms)
response_time_threshold.desc: Alert when P95 response time exceeds this value.

cooldown.label: Alert Cooldown (minutes)
cooldown.desc: Minutes to wait before sending the same alert type again.

backups.schedule_desc: Use cron format (min hour * * *) or HH:MM. Example: 0 2 * * *
backups.retention_desc: Old backups older than this will be deleted automatically.

global.enable_desc: Run automatic global backups on a simple schedule (uses app timezone).
global.run_now_desc: Queue a one-time global backup on the scheduler.

tenant.enable_desc: Run automatic backups for tenant data on a simple schedule (uses app timezone).
tenant.run_now_desc: Queue one-time backups for all active tenants.

mode.label: Schedule Type
mode.desc: Choose how often backups are created.

every.label: Every
every.desc: Interval value. Example: 15 minutes or 6 hours.

at.label: At
at.desc: Time of day to run the backup.

weekday.label: Weekday
weekday.desc: Day of week to run the backup.

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.desc: Used to interpret daily/weekly schedule times.

plans.title: Subscription Plans
plans.subtitle: Manage pricing tiers and plan status

errors.default_cannot_deactivate: Default plan cannot be deactivated. Set another default first.

confirm.delete_message: Delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.activate_message: Activate "{name}"? Tenants can be assigned to it again.
confirm.deactivate_message: Deactivate "{name}"? Tenants can no longer be assigned to it.
confirm.default_message: Make "{name}" the default plan for new tenants?

empty.title: No plans found
empty.subtitle: Try adjusting your search or filters.

greeting.welcome_message: Here's what's happening with your account today.

admin_mode.title: Administrator Mode
admin_mode.description: You have system-wide permissions. Access management tools here.

empty.title: No activity yet
empty.description: When you start using the app, your activity will appear here.

empty.title: No announcements yet
empty.description: When the team publishes updates, they will show up here.

profile.title: Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences.

general.title: Profile Information
general.subtitle: Update your account details and public profile.

security.title: Password & Security
security.subtitle: Manage your password and security settings.

twofa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twofa.subtitle: Protect your account with an extra layer of security.

preferences.title: Appearance
preferences.subtitle: Customize the look and feel of the application.
preferences.dark_mode_desc: Toggle between dark and light themes.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.subtitle: Customize how and when you want to be notified.

push.active_desc: You are subscribed to real-time updates on this device.
push.enable_desc: Get real-time updates even when the app is closed.

messages.twofa_required: Your organization requires Two-Factor Authentication. Please enable it to continue.

delete.title: Delete Role
delete.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the role "{name}"? All users assigned to this role might lose permissions.

form.system_name_locked: System role names cannot be changed

hints.assign: Assignee expects a team member user_id. Leave empty to keep unassigned.

email_outbox.title: Email Outbox
email_outbox.subtitle: Monitor queued and failed emails, and retry delivery.

team.title: Manage Team
team.desc: View, edit, and invite team members.

invoices.title: Billing & Invoices
invoices.subtitle: View and manage your subscription payments

settings.title: Global Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage application configuration, security, and integrations.

branding.custom_domain_help_prefix: Point your domain's CNAME record to
branding.custom_domain_pro_title: Custom Domain is a Pro Feature
branding.custom_domain_pro_desc: Upgrade your plan to use your own domain name.

security.enforce_2fa_desc: Require all members of this organization to enable 2FA before accessing the dashboard.

queue.title: Delivery Queue & Retry
queue.desc: Queue outgoing emails and automatically retry transient failures.
queue.enabled_desc: Recommended for production to prevent lost emails.

test.desc: Send a test email or verify SMTP connectivity.

smtp_test.hint: Checks connectivity and auth without sending an email.

manual.placeholder_instructions: Please transfer to BCA 1234567890 a/n PT Company...

test_email.title: Test Email Configuration
test_email.description: Save your changes first, then send a test email to verify your SMTP settings.

team.title: Team Members
team.subtitle: Manage your organization members and access

remove.title: Remove Team Member
remove.message: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the team? They will lose access immediately.

empty.title: No Team Members Yet
empty.description: Add your colleagues to collaborate on this workspace.
empty.try_adjusting: Try adjusting your search or filters.
